data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Om6sJrJPiUYQ7kNvgFKUOFe&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAXPZ4jVeDITy8LQeOD0aotVtBGASWlDra-Lp7aZg1BVg&oe=66D5B58C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qJegEQAC33QQ7kNvgH1gqWT&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB-mz3mtofU-qp64H2ihv2gGn6PRLbAXiXt17LqQjBcLg&oe=66D5B39F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pYIICqNCbmsQ7kNvgFtoR10&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC-g4Xb59uh_33fcLLLe_hySOPsEWZxZbXTB4Y5WsdAtA&oe=66D598F1)
